title: Great Falls Park: Brochures
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Brochures            Brochures           Great Falls Park     The maps and brochures below will open in a new window.   Great Falls Park brochure Great Falls Park hiking map: letter size- A detailed trail map with trail descriptions and distances in miles and kilometers.  This is a .gif image.       The Potomac Gorge Great Falls Park lies within the larger Potomac Gorge.  Discover this fifteen mile long gorge in this brochure.  Both files are .pdf and may take some time to load. Potomac Gorge Side 1  Potomac Gorge Side 2           The Patowmack Canal  Self-guided Tour of the Historic Canal
